contributionDisclaimer.policyAgreement: By proceeding with this transaction, you agree to our <privacy>privacy policy</privacy> and <terms>terms & conditions</terms>.

authorizePayment.one_time: Additionally, by proceeding with this transaction, you're authorizing today's payment of {{amountText}} to be processed on or adjacent to {{date}}.
authorizePayment.month: Additionally, by proceeding with this transaction, you're authorizing today's payment, along with all future recurring payments of {{amountText}} to be processed on or adjacent to the {{date}} of the month until you cancel.
authorizePayment.year: Additionally, by proceeding with this transaction, you're authorizing today's payment, along with all future recurring payments of {{amountText}} to be processed on or adjacent to {{date}} yearly until you cancel.
